lines.text: So- there's all this evidence of a fire...
Maybe the guy got burnt to a crisp, then... tried to cast Mass Arrest Momentum on himself to put out the fire?
And it worked, but he couldn't dispel it because he couldn't move his mouth to say ''dispel <c=#0000FF>Mass Arrest Momentum''</c> out loud?
That'd explain why it's hard like rock- even if it's just ash, it's magically frozen in place!
I don't know if we've been over this before, but...
There ain't no ash on the floor around him.
And- didn't you say that spell ended at-will? You tellin' me it needs an incantation to cancel, now?
